name: Bluetooth.getAvailability
description: The getAvailability() method of Bluetooth interface of Web Bluetooth API interface exposes the Bluetooth capabilities of the current device. For a returns a Boolean which is true if the deveice has a Bluetooth adapter and false otherwise (unless user configured User Agent not to expose a real value).

refs.name: Web Bluetooth
refs.description: The definition of 'getAvailability()' in the 'Web Bluetooth' specification.
